creator: Ginmon Vermögensverwaltung GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Ginmon is the digital wealth manager with state-of-the-art portfolio technology for maximum investment success.

With the App, you always have your Ginmon account at your disposal.

Functionalities of the app:
- View account balance and performance
- Overview in the newsfeed of all account activities
- View information on your investment strategy and investment modules
- Make deposits and withdrawals at any time
- Change monthly savings rate
descriptionShort: The digital wealth manager for maximum investment success.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Various improvements

title: Ginmon

creator: Ginmon Vermögensverwaltung GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Ginmon combines state-of-the-art Robo-Advisor technology with Nobel Prize-winning investment strategies. With a digitally processed investment based on leading capital market research, Ginmon makes more of your money. Lean back and let your money work for you.

With the Ginmon app, you can always keep an eye on your portfolio.

Use the Ginmon app to:
- Track your investment’s performance and view your account balance
- Obtain information on your investment strategy and the asset allocation of your portfolio
- View account activities and transactions
- Make deposits and withdrawals at any time
- Change monthly savings rate
- Access important documents and download them easily

Your advantages with Ginmon:
✓ Globally diversified ETF portfolio
✓ No minimum term
✓ Professional ETF selection by investment experts
✓ 24/7 active risk management
✓ Low fees (0.75% p.a.) with no hidden fees
✓ Unique tax optimization of your investment

Open your account in a matter of minutes and then sit back and relax while your money works for you.
descriptionShort: The leading digital wealth manager for maximum investment success.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Various improvements
Video-Identification using WebID

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are working every day to make the Ginmon app even better for you. Download the latest version to benefit from the newest features.

The latest version includes the opening of sub-accounts directly in the app, no matter if it's an investment account, savings account or VL account. Also, the product selection has been greatly simplified and new intro screens have been added to the app.

creator: Ginmon Vermögensverwaltung GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Ginmon combines state-of-the-art Robo-Advisor technology with Nobel Prize-winning investment strategies. With a digitally processed investment based on leading capital market research, Ginmon makes more of your money. Lean back and let your money work for you.

With the Ginmon app, you can always keep an eye on your portfolio.

Use the Ginmon app to:
- Track your investment’s performance and view your account balance
- Obtain information on your investment strategy and the asset allocation of your portfolio
- View account activities and transactions
- Make deposits and withdrawals at any time
- Change monthly savings rate
- Access important documents and download them easily

Your advantages with Ginmon:
✓ Globally diversified ETF portfolio
✓ No minimum term
✓ Professional ETF selection by investment experts
✓ 24/7 active risk management
✓ Low fees (0.75% p.a.) with no hidden fees
✓ Unique tax optimization of your investment

Open your account in a matter of minutes and then sit back and relax while your money works for you.
descriptionShort: The leading digital wealth manager for maximum investment success.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are working every day to make the Ginmon app even better for you. Download the latest version to benefit from the newest features.

The latest version includes an improved overview over your accounts, an improved account creation and various small improvements.

Open your account in a matter of minutes and then sit back and relax while your money works for you.
descriptionShort: The leading digital wealth manager for maximum investment success.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are working every day to make the Ginmon app even better for you. Download the latest version to benefit from the newest features.

The latest version includes the possibility to add and manage Ginmon Motive Investments. We have also made many small improvements.

title:
Ginmon
5.25.2

creator: Ginmon GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Ginmon combines state-of-the-art Robo-Advisor technology with Nobel Prize-winning investment strategies. With a digitally processed investment based on leading capital market research, Ginmon makes more of your money. Lean back and let your money work for you.

With the Ginmon app, you can always keep an eye on your portfolio.

Use the Ginmon app to:
- Track your investment’s performance and view your account balance
- Obtain information on your investment strategy and the asset allocation of your portfolio
- View account activities and transactions
- Make deposits and withdrawals at any time
- Change monthly savings rate
- Access important documents and download them easily

Your advantages with Ginmon:
✓ Globally diversified ETF portfolio
✓ No minimum term
✓ Professional ETF selection by investment experts
✓ 24/7 active risk management
✓ Low fees (0.75% p.a.) with no hidden fees
✓ Unique tax optimization of your investment

Open your account in a matter of minutes and then sit back and relax while your money works for you.
descriptionShort: The leading digital wealth manager for maximum investment success.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are working every day to make the Ginmon app even better for you. Download the latest version to benefit from the newest features.

The latest version fixes some buttons not working when "reduced motion" system option was used.

title:
Ginmon
5.32.2

creator: Ginmon GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Ginmon – Your Personal Finance Coach for a smarter Wealth Management

Achieve your financial goals with cutting-edge technology, scientific excellence, and intuitive usability. Ginmon provides professional support for your wealth management, based on leading capital market research.

What makes Ginmon stand out:

✓ Goal-Oriented Financial Planning: Define personal financial goals, such as retirement planning, homeownership, rainy day funds, or growing wealth. Ginmon develops the optimal solution for each goal.
✓ Professional ETF Management: Benefit from globally diversified investment strategies that are continuously optimised.
✓ Next-Generation Tax Optimisation: Thanks to our unique technology, your investments are also tax-optimised - ensuring your tax allowances are always fully utilised.
✓ Personalised Recommendations: Intelligent suggestions help you achieve your financial goals as effectively as possible.

Features of the Ginmon App:

✓ Overview of your goals, progress, and wealth development
✓ Live insights into your portfolio and the composition of your investments
✓ Flexible adjustment of savings rates as well as deposits and withdrawals
✓ Access to all important documents - anytime, anywhere

Your Benefits with Ginmon:

✓ Scientifically Backed: Our investment strategies are based on leading research and award-winning models.
✓ State-of-the-Art Technology: Automated 24/7 risk management and innovative tax optimisation ensure maximum efficiency.
✓ Transparent and Flexible: Clear fee structure with no hidden costs or minimum terms.
✓ Trusted and Proven: Award-winning provider (CAPITAL, Finanztip, and more) managing €400 million in assets.

Get Started Now: Sign up in just a few minutes. Download the Ginmon app, set your goals, and start managing your wealth today.
descriptionShort: Ginmon — Your Personal Finance Coach for a smarter Wealth Management

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Enhanced Login Security: Improved authentication process for even greater protection.
• Multi-Account Optimisation: All account actions can now be performed directly from its respective account overview.
• Modernised Design: A refreshed, intuitive user interface for clearer and more efficient navigation.
• Personalised Recommendations: Our new recommendation technology provides relevant insights to optimise your account and investments.
